alert.note: Alert for Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 10:59PM EDT until June 16 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Along the banks of the lower Cape Fear River including downtown Wilmington and tidal tributaries. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Portions of Battleship Road and USS North Carolina Road observe minor coastal flooding up to one foot in depth. In downtown Wilmington, sections of Water Street observe minor flooding up to one half foot in depth. Check with local officials for any road closures or impacts. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Cape Fear River at Wilmington MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.8 ft, Major 10.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 0.8 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/12 AM 6.2 1.5 1.0 N/A Minor 16/12 PM 5.0 0.3 1.0 N/A None 17/01 AM 5.9 1.2 0.8 N/A Minor 17/01 PM 4.7 0.0 0.7 N/A None 18/02 AM 5.8 1.1 0.8 N/A Minor 18/02 PM 4.9 0.2 0.8 N/A None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
